00043 class UnexpectedParameterException : public CalvinException
00044 {
00045 public:
00046         UnexpectedParameterException(const std::wstring& expectedType_) : expectedType(expectedType_) {}

00050 };

00053 class OutOfRangeParameterException : public CalvinException
00054 {
00055 public:
00060         OutOfRangeParameterException(const std::wstring& lower_, const std::wstring& upper_):
00061                 lower(lower_), upper(upper_) {}
00062 protected:
00063         std::wstring lower;
00064         std::wstring upper;
00065 };

00074         ParameterStringTooLongException(int32_t len): maxLen(len) {}
